item.title: on version control
item.description: I used to fear the use of git, especially on projects that involved multiple stakeholders with no protection. Fast forward to today, I version control all of my projects (dotfiles, blogs, school work, tutorials etc…) and I’m no longer afraid to work through merge conflicts and rebases. It all started with me trying to under more about git, through Git Pro. I believe understanding how git works is fundamental for all engineers.

item.title: first post
item.description: Hey, This is the first post of my humble blog. Somewhere along this year, I decided I wanted to write more. Writing helps to improve communication skills, which I needed work on. After some months of procrastination, I stumbled upon this blogpost and decided to get started on it. Stay tuned for content on engineering, and maybe some slice-of-life.
